pilots.name: Lieutenant Karsabi
pilots.caption: Brash Noble
pilots.ability: After you gain a disarm token, if you are not stressed, you may gain 1 stress token to remove 1 disarm token.

pilots.name: Major Vynder
pilots.caption: Pragmatic Survivor
pilots.ability: While you defend, if you are disarmed, roll 1 additional defense die.

pilots.name: Nu Squadron Pilot
pilots.text: With a design inspired by other Cygnus Spaceworks vessels, the Alpha-class star wing is a versatile craft assigned to Imperial Navy specialist units that need a starfighter they can outfit for multiple roles.

pilots.name: Rho Squadron Pilot
pilots.text: The elite pilots of Rho Squadron instill terror in the Rebellion, using both the Xg-1 assault configuration and Os-1 arsenal loadout of the Alpha-class star wing to devastating effect.

pilots.name: Captain Kagi
pilots.caption: The Emperor's Shuttle Pilot
pilots.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 or more friendly ships at range 0-3. If you do, transfer all enemy lock tokens from the chosen ships to you.

pilots.name: Colonel Jendon
pilots.caption: Darth Vader's Shuttle Pilot
pilots.ability: At the start of the Activation Phase, you may spend 1 [Charge]. If you do, while friendly ships acquire lock this round, they must acquire locks beyond range 3 instead of at range 0-3.

pilots.name: Lieutenant Sai
pilots.caption: Death Squadron Veteran
pilots.ability: After you a perform a [Coordinate] action, if the ship you chose performed an action on your action bar, you may perform that action.

pilots.name: Omicron Group Pilot
pilots.text: Noted for its tri-wing design and advanced sensor suite, the Lambda-class shuttle serves a critical role as a light utility craft in the Imperial Navy.

pilots.name: Baron of the Empire
pilots.text: Sienar Fleet System's TIE Advanced v1 is a groundbreaking starfighter design, featuring upgraded engines, a missile launcher, and folding s-foils.

pilots.name: Grand Inquisitor
pilots.caption: Master of the Inquisitorious
pilots.ability: While you defend at attack range 1, you may spend 1 [Force] to prevent the range 1 bonus. While you perform an attack against a defender at attack range 2-3, you may spend 1 [Force] to apply the range 1 bonus.

pilots.name: Inquisitor
pilots.text: The fearsome Inquisitors are given a great deal of autonomy and access to the Empire's latest technology, like the prototype TIE Advanced v1.

pilots.name: Seventh Sister
pilots.caption: Sadistic Interrogator
pilots.ability: While you perform a primary attack, before the Neutralize Results step, you may spend 2 [Force] to cancel 1 [Evade] result.

pilots.name: Darth Vader
pilots.caption: Black Leader
pilots.ability: After you perform an action, you may spend 1 [Force] to perform an action.

shipAbility.name: Advanced Targeting Computer
shipAbility.text: While you perform a primary attack against a defender you have locked, roll 1 additional attack die and change 1 [Hit] result to a [Critical Hit] result.

pilots.name: Maarek Stele
pilots.caption: Servant of the Empire
pilots.ability: While you perform an attack, if the defender would be dealt a faceup damage card, instead draw 3 damage cards, choose 1, and discard the rest.

shipAbility.name: Advanced Targeting Computer
shipAbility.text: While you perform a primary attack against a defender you have locked, roll 1 additional attack die and change 1 [Hit] result to a [Critical Hit] result.

pilots.name: Storm Squadron Ace
pilots.text: The TIE Advanced x1 was produced in limited quantities, but Sienar engineers incorporated many of its best qualities into their next TIE model: the TIE Interceptor.

shipAbility.name: Advanced Targeting Computer
shipAbility.text: While you perform a primary attack against a defender you have locked, roll 1 additional attack die and change 1 [Hit] result to a [Critical Hit] result.

pilots.name: Tempest Squadron Pilot
pilots.text: The TIE Advanced improved on the popular TIE/ln design by adding shielding, better weapons systems, curved solar panels, and a hyperdrive.

shipAbility.name: Advanced Targeting Computer
shipAbility.text: While you perform a primary attack against a defender you have locked, roll 1 additional attack die and change 1 [Hit] result to a [Critical Hit] result.

pilots.name: Ved Foslo
pilots.caption: Ambitious Engineer
pilots.ability: While you execute a maneuver, you may execute a maneuver of the same bearing and difficulty of a speed 1 higher or lower instead.

shipAbility.name: Advanced Targeting Computer
shipAbility.text: While you perform a primary attack against a defender you have locked, roll 1 additional attack die and change 1 [Hit] result to a [Critical Hit] result.

pilots.name: Zertik Strom
pilots.caption: Pitiless Administrator
pilots.ability: During the End Phase, you may spend a lock you have on an enemy ship to expose 1 of that ship's damage cards.

shipAbility.name: Advanced Targeting Computer
shipAbility.text: While you perform a primary attack against a defender you have locked, roll 1 additional attack die and change 1 [Hit] result to a [Critical Hit] result.

pilots.name: "Double Edge"
pilots.caption: Contingency Planner
pilots.ability: After you perform a [Turret] or [Missile] attack that misses, you may perform a bonus attack using a different weapon.

pilots.name: Lieutenant Kestal
pilots.caption: Innate Deadeye
pilots.ability: While you perform an attack, after the defender rolls defense dice, you may spend 1 focus token to cancel all of the defender's blank/[Focus] results.

pilots.name: Onyx Squadron Scout
pilots.text: Designed for extended engagements, the TIE/ag is flown primarily by elite pilots trained to leverage both its unique weapons loadout and its maneuverability to full effect.

pilots.name: Sienar Specialist
pilots.text: During the development of the TIE aggressor, Sienar Fleet Systems valued performance and versatility over raw cost efficiency.

pilots.name: "Deathrain"
pilots.caption: Dexterous Bombardier
pilots.ability: After you drop or launch a device, you may perform an action.

pilots.name: "Redline"
pilots.caption: Adrenaline Junkie
pilots.ability: You can maintain up to 2 locks. After you perform an action, you may acquire a lock.

pilots.name: Cutlass Squadron Pilot
pilots.text: The TIE punisher's design builds upon the success of the TIE bomber, adding shielding, a second bomb chute, and three additional ordnance pods, each equipped with a twin ion engine.

pilots.name: Colonel Vessery
pilots.caption: Contemplative Commander
pilots.ability: While you perform an attack against a locked ship, after you roll attack dice, you may acquire a lock on the defender.

shipAbility.name: Full Throttle
shipAbility.text: After you fully execute a speed 3-5 maneuver, you may perform an [Evade] action.

pilots.name: Countess Ryad
pilots.caption: Cutthroat Politico
pilots.ability: While you would execute a [Straight] maneuver, you may increase the difficulty of the maneuver. If you do, execute it as a [Koiogran Turn] maneuver instead.

shipAbility.name: Full Throttle
shipAbility.text: After you fully execute a speed 3-5 maneuver, you may perform an [Evade] action.

pilots.name: Delta Squadron Pilot
pilots.text: In addition to its missile launchers and six wingtip laser cannons, the formidable TIE defender is equipped with deflector shields and a hyperdrive.

shipAbility.name: Full Throttle
shipAbility.text: After you fully execute a speed 3-5 maneuver, you may perform an [Evade] action.

pilots.name: Onyx Squadron Ace
pilots.text: The experimental TIE defender outclasses all other contemporary starfighters, though its size, speed, and array of weapons come at a tremendous cost in credits.

shipAbility.name: Full Throttle
shipAbility.text: After you fully execute a speed 3-5 maneuver, you may perform an [Evade] action.

pilots.name: Rexler Brath
pilots.caption: Onyx Leader
pilots.ability: After you perform an attack that hits, if you are evading, expose 1 of the defender's damage cards.

shipAbility.name: Full Throttle
shipAbility.text: After you fully execute a speed 3-5 maneuver, you may perform an [Evade] action.

pilots.name: Alpha Squadron Pilot
pilots.text: Sienar Fleet Systems designed the TIE interceptor with four wing-mounted laser cannons, a dramatic increase in firepower over its predecessors.

shipAbility.name: Autothrusters
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Barrel Roll] or red [Boost] action.

pilots.name: Saber Squadron Ace
pilots.text: Led by Baron Soontir Fel, the pilots of Saber Squadron are among the Empire's best. Their TIE interceptors are marked with red stripes to designate pilots with at least ten confirmed kills.

shipAbility.name: Autothrusters
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Barrel Roll] or red [Boost] action.

pilots.name: Soontir Fel
pilots.caption: Ace of Legend
pilots.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, if there is an enemy ship in your [Bullseye Arc], gain 1 focus token.

shipAbility.name: Autothrusters
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Barrel Roll] or red [Boost] action.

pilots.name: Turr Phennir
pilots.caption: Ambitious Ace
pilots.ability: After you perform an attack, you may perform a [Barrel Roll] or [Boost] action, even if you are stressed.

shipAbility.name: Autothrusters
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Barrel Roll] or red [Boost] action.

pilots.name: "Howlrunner"
pilots.caption: Obsidian Leader
pilots.ability: While a friendly ship at range 0-1 performs a primary attack, that ship may reroll 1 attack die.

pilots.name: "Mauler" Mithel
pilots.caption: Black Two
pilots.ability: While you perform an attack at attack range 1, roll 1 additional attack die.

pilots.name: "Night Beast"
pilots.caption: Obsidian Two
pilots.ability: After you fully execute a blue maneuver, you may perform a [Focus] action.

pilots.name: "Scourge" Skutu
pilots.caption: Seasoned Veteran
pilots.ability: While you perform an attack against a defender in your [Bullseye Arc], roll 1 additional attack die.

pilots.name: "Wampa"
pilots.caption: Black Eleven
pilots.ability: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1 [Charge] to roll 1 additional attack die. After defending, lose 1 [Charge].

pilots.name: Academy Pilot
pilots.text: The Galactic Empire uses the fast and agile TIE/ln, developed by Sienar Fleet Systems and produced in staggering quantity, as its primary starfighter.

pilots.name: Black Squadron Ace
pilots.text: The elite TIE/ln pilots of Black Squadron accompanied Darth Vader on a devastating strike against the Rebel forces at the Battle of Yavin.

pilots.name: Del Meeko
pilots.caption: Inferno Three
pilots.ability: While a friendly ship at range 0-2 defends against a damaged attacker, the defender may reroll 1 defense die.

pilots.name: Gideon Hask
pilots.caption: Inferno Two
pilots.ability: While you perform an attack against a damaged defender, roll 1 additional attack die.

pilots.name: Iden Versio
pilots.caption: Inferno Leader
pilots.ability: Before a friendly TIE/ln fighter at range 0-1 would suffer 1 or more damage, you may spend 1 [Charge]. If you do, prevent that damage.

pilots.name: Obsidian Squadron Pilot
pilots.text: The TIE fighter's Twin Ion Engine system was designed for speed, making the TIE/ln one of the most maneuverable starships ever mass-produced.

pilots.name: Seyn Marana
pilots.caption: Inferno Four
pilots.ability: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1 [Critical Hit] result. If you do, deal 1 facedown damage card to the defender, then cancel you remaining results.

pilots.name: Valen Rudor
pilots.caption: Braggadocious Baron
pilots.ability: After a friendly ship at range 0-1 defends (after damage is resolved, if any), you may perform an action.

pilots.name: "Echo"
pilots.caption: Slippery Trickster
pilots.ability: While you decloak, you must use the [2 [Bank Left]] or [2 [Bank Right]] template instead of the [2 [Straight]] template.

shipAbility.name: Stygium Array
shipAbility.text: After you decloak, you may perform an [Evade] action. At the start of the End Phase, you may spend 1 evade token to gain 1 cloak token.

pilots.name: "Whisper"
pilots.caption: Soft-Spoken Slayer
pilots.ability: After you perform an attack that hits, gain 1 evade token.

shipAbility.name: Stygium Array
shipAbility.text: After you decloak, you may perform an [Evade] action. At the start of the End Phase, you may spend 1 evade token to gain 1 cloak token.

pilots.name: Imdaar Test Pilot
pilots.text: The primary result of a hidden research facility on Imdaar Alpha, the TIE phantom achieves what many thought was impossible: a small starfighter equipped with an advanced cloaking device.

shipAbility.name: Stygium Array
shipAbility.text: After you decloak, you may perform an [Evade] action. At the start of the End Phase, you may spend 1 evade token to gain 1 cloak token.

pilots.name: Sigma Squadron Ace
pilots.text: Featuring a hyperdrive and shields, the TIE phantom is also equipped with five laser cannons, giving it substantial firepower for an Imperial fighter.

shipAbility.name: Stygium Array
shipAbility.text: After you decloak, you may perform an [Evade] action. At the start of the End Phase, you may spend 1 evade token to gain 1 cloak token.

pilots.name: "Vizier"
pilots.caption: Ruthless Tactician
pilots.ability: After you fully execute a speed 1 maneuver using your Adaptive Ailerons ship ability, you may perform a [Coordinate] action. If you do, skip your Perform Action step.

shipAbility.name: Adaptive Ailerons
shipAbility.text: Before you reveal your dial, if you are not stressed, you must execute a white [1 [Bank Left]], [1 [Straight]], or [1 [Bank Right]] maneuver.

pilots.name: Captain Feroph
pilots.caption: Imperial Courier
pilots.ability: While you defend, if the attacker does not have any green tokens, you may change 1 of your [Focus]/blank results to an [Evade] result.

shipAbility.name: Adaptive Ailerons
shipAbility.text: Before you reveal your dial, if you are not stressed, you must execute a white [1 [Bank Left]], [1 [Straight]], or [1 [Bank Right]] maneuver.

pilots.name: Major Vermeil
pilots.caption: Veteran of Scarif
pilots.ability: While you perform an attack, if the defender does not have any green tokens, you may change 1 of your [Focus]/blank results to a [Hit] result.

shipAbility.name: Adaptive Ailerons
shipAbility.text: Before you reveal your dial, if you are not stressed, you must execute a white [1 [Bank Left]], [1 [Straight]], or [1 [Bank Right]] maneuver.

pilots.name: Scarif Base Pilot
pilots.text: The TIE reaper was designed to ferry elite troops to flashpoints on the battlefield, notably carrying Director Krennic's dreaded death troopers at the Battle of Scarif.

shipAbility.name: Adaptive Ailerons
shipAbility.text: Before you reveal your dial, if you are not stressed, you must execute a white [1 [Bank Left]], [1 [Straight]], or [1 [Bank Right]] maneuver.

pilots.name: "Deathfire"
pilots.caption: Unflinching Diehard
pilots.ability: After you are destroyed, before you are removed, you may perform an attack and drop or launch 1 device.

shipAbility.name: Nimble Bomber
shipAbility.text: If you would drop a device using a [Straight] template, you may use a [Bank Left] or [Bank Right] template of the same speed instead.

pilots.name: Captain Jonus
pilots.caption: Disciplined Instructor
pilots.ability: While a friendly ship at range 0-1 performs a [Torpedo] or [Missile] attack, that ship may reroll up to 2 attack dice.

shipAbility.name: Nimble Bomber
shipAbility.text: If you would drop a device using a [Straight] template, you may use a [Bank Left] or [Bank Right] template of the same speed instead.

pilots.name: Gamma Squadron Ace
pilots.text: Though it sacrifices a degree of speed and maneuverability compared to a TIE/ln, the TIE bomber's increased payload can carry enough firepower to destroy virtually any enemy target.

shipAbility.name: Nimble Bomber
shipAbility.text: If you would drop a device using a [Straight] template, you may use a [Bank Left] or [Bank Right] template of the same speed instead.

pilots.name: Major Rhymer
pilots.caption: Scimitar Leader
pilots.ability: While you perform a [Torpedo] or [Missile] attack, you may increase or decrease the range requirement by 1, to a limit of 0-3.

shipAbility.name: Nimble Bomber
shipAbility.text: If you would drop a device using a [Straight] template, you may use a [Bank Left] or [Bank Right] template of the same speed instead.

pilots.name: Scimitar Squadron Pilot
pilots.text: The TIE/sa is exceptionally nimble for a bomber, allowing it to pinpoint its target while avoiding excessive collateral damage to the surrounding area.

shipAbility.name: Nimble Bomber
shipAbility.text: If you would drop a device using a [Straight] template, you may use a [Bank Left] or [Bank Right] template of the same speed instead.

pilots.name: Tomax Bren
pilots.caption: Brash Maverick
pilots.ability: After you perform a [Reload] action, you may revocer 1 [Charge] token on 1 of your equipped [Talent] upgrade cards.

shipAbility.name: Nimble Bomber
shipAbility.text: If you would drop a device using a [Straight] template, you may use a [Bank Left] or [Bank Right] template of the same speed instead.

pilots.name: "Countdown"
pilots.caption: Death Defier
pilots.ability: While you defend, after the Neutralize Results step, if you are not stressed, you may suffer 1 [Hit] damage and gain 1 stress token. If you do, cancel all dice results.

shipAbility.name: Adaptive Ailerons
shipAbility.text: Before you reveal your dial, if you are not stressed, you must execute a white (1 [Bank Left]), (1 [Straight]), or (1 [Bank Right]) maneuver.

pilots.name: "Duchess"
pilots.caption: Urbane Ace
pilots.ability: You may choose not to use your Adaptive Ailerons. You may use your Adaptive Ailerons even while stressed.

shipAbility.name: Adaptive Ailerons
shipAbility.text: Before you reveal your dial, if you are not stressed, you must execute a white (1 [Bank Left]), (1 [Straight]), or (1 [Bank Right]) maneuver.

pilots.name: "Pure Sabacc"
pilots.caption: Confident Gambler
pilots.ability: While you perform an attack, if you have 1 or fewer damage cards, you may roll 1 additional attack die.

shipAbility.name: Adaptive Ailerons
shipAbility.text: Before you reveal your dial, if you are not stressed, you must execute a white [1 [Bank Left]], [1 [Straight]], or [1 [Bank Right]] maneuver.

pilots.name: Black Squadron Scout
pilots.text: These heavily armed atmospheric craft employ their specialized moveable wings to gain additional speed and maneuverability.

shipAbility.name: Adaptive Ailerons
shipAbility.text: Before you reveal your dial, if you are not stressed, you must execute a white [1 [Bank Left]], [1 [Straight]], or [1 [Bank Right]] maneuver.

pilots.name: Planetary Sentinel
pilots.text: To protect its many military installations, the Empire requires a swift and vigilant defense force.

shipAbility.name: Adaptive Ailerons
shipAbility.text: Before you reveal your dial, if you are not stressed, you must execute a white [1 [Bank Left]], [1 [Straight]], or [1 [Bank Right]] maneuver.

pilots.name: Captain Oicunn
pilots.caption: Inspired Tactician
pilots.ability: You can perform primary attacks at range 0.

pilots.name: Patrol Leader
pilots.text: To be granted command of a VT-49 Decimator is seen as a significant promotion for a middling officer of the Imperial Navy.

pilots.name: Rear Admiral Chiraneau
pilots.caption: Advisor to Admiral Piett
pilots.ability: While you perform an attack, if you are reinforced and the defender is in the [Full Front Arc] or [Full Rear Arc] matching your reinforce token, you may change 1 of your [Focus] results to a [Critical Hit] result.
